lines.dialogue: Now, I'm starting to trust you. Just a little, but in the interest of transparacy I want you to know that I have a really big red button right here next to the keyboard that I can press the moment you turn evil and start killing people. So don't try it.
lines.instruction: Press enter to ponder if you could somehow deactivate that button...

lines.dialogue: I won't tell you what the button does, that would be needlessly cruel. I'll leave that to your imagination. I know we at least attempted to give you one. That way you can imagine the lives of all the people you run over.
lines.instruction: Press enter to grown increaingly angry at the disembodied voice...
